abilitiesRevealed.description: Creates iron restraints and cages from the user's body to bind opponents and damage structures

keyMoments.title: Hina Uses Ori Ori no Mi Against Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Hina demonstrates her Devil Fruit powers by creating iron restraints that damage the Going Merry's hull during the battle at the harbor.

abilitiesRevealed.description: Transforms into Monkey D. Luffy to create a diversion and confuse the Marines

keyMoments.title: Bon Kurei Impersonates Luffy
keyMoments.description: Bon Kurei uses his Clone-Clone Fruit powers to transform into Luffy, orchestrating a clever plan to help the Straw Hats escape.
